nodes.bodyText: CC @vietj to make sure you are OK with this change
Why do we need this as it's already defined in https://github.com/vert-x3/vertx-parent/blob/master/pom.xml?

I thought I ran into an incompatible class version change and this fixed it, but I just double checked and it looks like we were indeed compiling to 1.8 before, so I must have been mistaken -- I'll remove this
Intentionally leaving this comment here so I remember to clean it up once I do the global cleanup of the drda package
